name: River Road
description: A precisely calibrated curve in the 'managed eco-corridor' of River Road, offering a curated vista of the bio-remediated river itself, its waters a perfectly simulated murky-brown, flowing with an algorithmically generated indifference. You traverse River Road, where the genetically optimized arboreal structures grow denser, their branches forming a photosynthetic canopy that filters the simulated harshness of the afternoon sun, casting long, perfectly dappled shadows on the polished synth-ribbon. The air is precisely filtered, carrying the simulated scent of 'river water' and 'decaying leaves,' a poignant, yet controlled, reminder of time's relentless, yet managed, passage.
